import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[role,setRole]=useState('customer');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const{signIn}=useAuth();// Changed from login to signIn to match AuthContext
const navigate=useNavigate();// Changed from history to match React Router v6 naming
const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setIsLoading(true);if(!email){setError('Email is required.');setIsLoading(false);return;}try{// Call signIn function from AuthContext
const userData=await signIn(email,role);// Navigate based on the redirect path from the backend, if it exists
const redirectPath=userData.redirect||'/default-path';// Default to a fallback path
navigate(redirectPath);}catch(err){setError('Failed to sign in.
